Row.Text: +3[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production and +3[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture. Nepal Unique Improvement. Ageless. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on a Featureless Mountain tile and is constructed by the Sherpa once you have the Sagarmatha Mastery.
Nepalese Unique Improvement. Ageless. Does not remove Warehouse bonuses on a tile. Must be placed on a Featureless Mountain tile and is constructed by the Sherpa once you have the Sagarmatha Mastery.
+4 [icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence. Increase your Relationship with all other leaders by 20. Must be built in Tropical adjacent to a Mountain.
Increase your Relationship with all other leaders by 20. Must be built in Tropical adjacent to a Mountain.
Those who teach this ocean of wisdom realize the momentary nature of things.
